alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 14 at 12:17PM PST until November 16 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT PST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 55 mph possible on favored mountain peaks. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains, Southern Ventura County Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight PST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
